name: Unlock The King 2
description:
The continuation of the successful Unlock The King, now in a tridimensional board. A originally designed puzzle game inspired by Chess. Move the pieces and create a path to Unlock the King.

- Originally designed concept, including electronic board, lightning-fast piece movements, trigger buttons and movable parts;
- Designed for Unlock The King fans and newcomers alike;
- 70 originally design levels;
- Original soundtrack;
